string-array.name: sem2_eng_1
string-array.item: Choose the best response to the phrase:\n\n Do you want a hand?

string-array.name: sem2_eng_2
string-array.item: Choose the best response to the phrase:\n\n Can you give me a hand?

string-array.name: sem2_eng_3
string-array.item: Choose the best response to the phrase:\n\n Can you help me?

string-array.name: sem2_eng_4
string-array.item: Choose the best response to the phrase:\n\n Can I help?

string-array.name: sem2_eng_5
string-array.item:
Put these dialogues in the right order:

1 - Let me see…
2 - How do I print this document?
3 - What's the problem?

string-array.name: sem2_eng_6
string-array.item:
Put these dialogues in the right order:

1 - I'm trying to book a flight online.
2 - John, can you help me?
3 - Sure, what do you want?
4 - You have to login, then click here…

string-array.name: sem2_eng_7
string-array.item:
Complete the conversation:

A - I'm trying to download a document.
B - Can I ________?
A - Oh, ________, ________
